titleInfo.title: Half-metallic {Co2MnSi/Co2FeSi} multilayered Heusler electrodes in magnetic tunnel junctions

mods.abstract: It is demonstrated that the atomic ordering of Co2FeSi can significantly be improved in terms of magnetization and tunnel magnetoresistance using multilayered {Co(2)MnSi(5)nm/Co(2)FeSi(5)nm}(10) full-Heusler magnetic electrodes in magnetic tunnel junctions. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

titleInfo.title: JOURNAL OF MAGNETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS
